synopsis.text:
What awaits the Ferrari sisters, Hozuki, Kazuki, and Hazuki, in their thrilling journey that blends action, mystery, and sisterly bonds? Descendants of the legendary scientist Galileo Galilei, these three young women couldn't be more different from one another. When a mysterious organization kidnaps them in search of the enigmatic "Galileo Tesoro," the sisters must put aside their differences and join forces to escape.

In the year 2061, amidst another ice age, the sisters navigate through a world filled with danger and intrigue. With the organization hot on their heels, the Ferrari sisters embark on an adventure of a lifetime to uncover the truth behind the Galileo Tesoro and their connection to it. As they traverse the skies in their self-built airship, they must learn to work together despite their constant bickering.

Will the sisters unravel the secrets of their ancestor and the elusive Tesoro? Or will the mysterious organization succeed in capturing them and claiming the prize for themselves? Join Hozuki, Kazuki, and Hazuki as they forge their destinies in this captivating tale of sisterhood, adventure, and the power of family.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
